title: Red Riding armor
summaries: Red Riding armor is a Hardmode, post-Golem armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 1500000*150 [img:Defender Medal] in total, and provides summon as well as ranged damage bonuses. The set consists of the Red Riding Hood, Red Riding Dress, and Red Riding Leggings.
A full set of Red Riding armor provides the following stats:

• +48 defense
  • +25% ranged damage
  • +60% summon damage
  • +20% ranged critical strike chance
  • +20% ammo conservation
  • +20% movement speed
  • +3 extra sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will greatly increase the fire rate of <linked>Explosive Trap sentry summons</linked> and will cause their attacks to inflict the <linked>Oiled</linked> <linked>debuff</linked> for 4â€“8.5 seconds, making enemies take increased damage from <linked>On Fire!</linked>, <linked>Hellfire</linked>, <linked>Cursed Inferno</linked>, <linked>Frostburn</linked>, and <linked>Shadowflame</linked>.
The Red Riding armor can be considered a direct upgrade of the <linked>Huntress armor</linked>.
